page.title: 07The Voe School.
page.content: Olnafirth Primary School serves the district of Voe. It was opened in April 1961. The main building consists of two classrooms,a general purposes room,toilet facilities,staffroom and kitchen.In December 1983 a temporary wooden classroom was erected due to an increase in the school roll.This was caused by oil-related families moving into the district. At the moment the school roll stands at 48 and the children attending the school are aged between 4.5 and 12 years. Mrs. Colligan has been headmistress at the school since December 1969.There are two assistant teachers at the school as well as nine specialist peripatetic teachers. School dinners are provided for all children by the two school cooks.
